text:
With Outlook now being less focused on Office 365 (e.g. the new outlook has full Google GSuite compatibility) it would outstanding if HubSpot could update the Outlook add-in to work with other email accounts. My understanding of the outlook add-in is that it hits HubSpot APIs and injects the tracking pixel + bccs the HubSpot email. From the outside looking in, it certainly seems like there is no reason that it would require me to use O365 vs Google vs whatever when modifying this email when it's sent.

Screenshot attached to show what I mean. I want to use Outlook and my preferred email provider.
